snippet.title: Apeiron NFT - God Game First Teaser
snippet.description:
Official Marketplace: https://marketplace.apeironnft.com/
Official website: https://apeironnft.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/apeironNFT
Discord: https://discord.gg/apeiron-doodaria

World 1st Godgame x Roguelite
Apeiron is a Roguelite x God Game hybrid, a revival of the classic god simulation genre popular in the early 2000s. Players are able to 'play god'- by growing their own planets and controlling giant avatars in battle.

#godgame #roguelike #nft
